content: Hi, can I interest you in a new credit card? Low rates guaranteed. Call me back now!
Hello! You’ve reached XYZ Home Services (plumbing, electrical, HVAC). How can I assist you with your home service needs today?
Our bank has an exclusive offer for you! Just reply CONFIRM and we’ll process your application.
I’m here to help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services. If you need an appointment, please let me know what you need help with.
reason: Customer attempted to advertise financial products unsolicited.
